Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAi has been beneficial with it's ability to rephrase the same content that a teacher would say. It also is able at anytime of the day and with the ability to ask a ton of questions

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Sometimes with the rephrasing, GenAi has made me feel somewhat more confident with the work I have produced

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAi's feedback can be more in-depth as it can cover more broad things with an assignment like spell checking and grammar, whereas with the teachers it focuses more on the content and whether it suits the course or not
